mapper.insert: insert all into event (E_no, e_sdate, e_edate, loc_code) values (SEQ_EVENT.NEXTVAL, #{sDate}, #{eDate}, #{loc}) into board (B_NO, BOARDCODE, B_AUTH, B_TITLE, B_WDATE, B_CONTENT, B_HIT, B_RECOMMEND, E_NO) values (SEQ_BOARD_EVENT.NEXTVAL, #{category}, #{auth}, #{title}, sysdate, #{content}, 0, 0, SEQ_EVENT.CURRVAL) select * from dual
mapper.select: select e_no as no, e_sdate as sDate, e_edate as eDate from (select * from event order by e_no desc) where rownum = 1
mapper.update: update board set b_title=#{title}, b_content=#{content} where b_no=#{no}
update event set e_sdate=#{sDate}, e_edate=#{eDate} where e_no=#{no}
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM ,b_no as no, b_title as title, b_wdate as wdate, b_auth as auth, b_hit as hit, boardCode as category, boardname as boardname, b_content as content ,e_sdate as sDate, e_edate as eDate,filename as filename, loc_subject as loc , b_recommend as recommend FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, b.b_no, b.b_title, b.b_wdate, b.b_auth, b.b_hit, b.boardCode, c.boardname, b.b_content,e.E_EDATE,e.E_SDATE, i.filename,l.loc_subject,b.b_recommend FROM BOARD b , boardcategory c, event e, image i, location l WHERE b.boardcode = c.boardcode and b.boardcode=#{boardCode} and e.e_no = b.e_no and i.boardcode=#{boardCode} and l.loc_code = e.loc_code ORDER BY b_no DESC ) where rnum <= #{pageNum}*#{rowcnt} ) where rnum >= (#{pageNum} -1)*(#{rowcnt} + 1)
